title: Create a data masking policy
description: Creates a data policy to apply a data masking rule to a specific BigQuery table column. This is a primary mechanism for implementing column-level security in BigQuery.

objective.narrative: A developer needs to programmatically enforce data masking on sensitive columns in BigQuery tables. This sample provides the code to create a new data policy, specifying the masking rule and the target column, which automates the setup of column-level security controls.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatapolicy_v2_datapolicyservice_datapolicy_create
regionTags.title: Create a data masking policy
regionTags.description: Creates a data policy to apply a data masking rule to a specific BigQuery table column. This is a primary mechanism for implementing column-level security in BigQuery.
